long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Want to play Mergis Puzzle? Play this game online for free in your own Chrome browser, no internet required. Lots of fun to play when bored at home or at school.

From now on you can play Mergis Puzzleon Chrome browser easily!

Intro:
Mergis is the latest version of Tetris and merges games to play on. The blocks need to match and merge to make the higher blocks and survive as long as you can, for that you must release the blocks so that they match each other when they have the same number. Choose a lane to release. Merge them vertically. Some power-ups can help you. Score the highest possible! Have fun playing this game on this puzzle and play more Tetris games only games.1bestlinks.net

How to Play: 
You must drop the Merges for them to match when they have the same number. Pick a lane to drop. Merge them vertically. Several ways to increase strength can help you. Get the highest score possible!

long.en_AU,en_US,fi,ru,vi:
Mergis Game is an engaging and addictive puzzle game available as a Chrome extension. In this captivating game, your task is to merge identical blocks to create higher-value blocks. Combine two blocks of the same value to form a new block with a higher value. Strategically plan your moves to create larger and more valuable blocks while aiming to reach the highest score possible. With its minimalist design, soothing music, and intuitive gameplay, "Mergis" provides a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience. The Chrome extension offers easy access, allowing you to play the game directly in your browser. Challenge yourself to create the ultimate merged blocks and achieve high scores in "Mergis Game"!

How to Play: 
You must drop the Merges for them to match when they have the same number. Pick a lane to drop. Merge them vertically. Several ways to increase strength can help you. Get the highest score possible!

*Note:We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://monkeymart.org/
